translations: 表演……不充分；贬低……的重要性；扣着大牌不出而出小牌（underplay 的过去式及过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Perhaps I had underplayed the former and overplayed the latter.
sentences.translation: 可能我对前者描述的不够充分，而对后者又太过夸张了。

sentences.sentence: Unlike the birthday of the party, however, it is being oddly underplayed.
sentences.translation: 然而这个日子，却很奇怪的，没有得到如建党般的隆重庆祝。
